title: Basic audit — run and present findings
query: Run an accessibility audit on https://example.com
expected_behavior: Asks how to discover pages (Crawler or Sitemap) before running the audit
If user picks Sitemap, fetches `<URL>/sitemap.xml` and confirms page count before proceeding
Parses `REMEDIATION_PATH` from script output and reads the remediation guide
Summarizes findings grouped by severity (Critical → High → Medium → Low)
Groups findings by component or page area with explanations
Presents findings inline in the conversation (not as file paths)
Asks for permission before applying any fixes
Does NOT modify any source files before receiving permission
Does NOT create files in the user's project without explicit request
